ingredients.ingredient: 1 (2 pound) spaghetti squash, halved and seeded
2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed

cookingTips: Roast squash cut-side down at 400°F for 30-40 minutes until strands separate easily
Use a fork to shred the cooked squash along the natural grain lines
Dress simply with quality olive oil and fresh cheese to highlight the vegetable
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the best technique for extracting the strands from roasted spaghetti squash without breaking them?
